00012 /**
00013  * \brief Constructor initializes the positions,getbit will retrieve data from
00014  * \param dataptr Pointer to the data where the bit plane will be read.
00015  */
00016 CPlanes::CPlanes(byte *dataptr) :
00017 m_dataptr(dataptr)
00018 {}
00019 
00020 // retrieves a bit from plane "plane". the positions of the planes
00021 // should have been previously initilized with setplanepositions()
00022 unsigned char CPlanes::getbit(unsigned char plane)
00023 {
00024  int retval;
00025  int byt;
00026  if (!getbit_bitmask[plane])
00027  {
00028   getbit_bitmask[plane] = 128;
00029   getbit_bytepos[plane]++;
00030  }
00031  byt = m_dataptr[getbit_bytepos[plane]];
00032  
00033  if (byt & getbit_bitmask[plane])
00034   retval = 1;
00035  else
00036   retval = 0;
00037  
00038  getbit_bitmask[plane] >>= 1;
00039  
00040  return retval;
00041 }
00042 /**
00043  * \brief THis function is used for setting the offsets, so the bits can be read.
00044  * \param p1, p2, p3, p4, p5 The offsets of the planes where the bits are going to be read
00045  */
00046 void CPlanes::setOffsets(unsigned long p1, unsigned long p2, unsigned long p3,
00047      unsigned long p4, unsigned long p5)
00048 {
00049 
00050  getbit_bytepos[0] = p1;
00051  getbit_bytepos[1] = p2;
00052  getbit_bytepos[2] = p3;
00053  getbit_bytepos[3] = p4;
00054  getbit_bytepos[4] = p5;
00055 
00056  for(int i=0;i<5;i++)
00057      getbit_bitmask[i] = 128;
00058 }
00059 /**
00060  * This functions read one plane of graphics to a designated pointer which is derived by
00061  * a SDL-Surface normally
00062  */
00063 void CPlanes::readPlane(size_t p, Uint8 *pixels, Uint16 width, Uint16 height)
00064 {
00065  for(Uint16 y=0 ; y<height ; y++)
00066  {
00067   for(Uint16 x=0 ; x<width ; x++)
00068   {
00069    pixels[y*width + x] |= (getbit(p) << p);
00070   }
00071  }
00072 }
00073 
00074 /**
00075  * This functions read one plane of graphics to a designated pointer which is derived by
00076  * a SDL-Surface normally. This function is used for tilemaps, which need to be read
00077  * differently from the gamedata of Keen
00078  */
00079 void CPlanes::readPlaneofTiles(size_t p, Uint8 *pixels, Uint16 columns,
00080         Uint16 tilesize, Uint16 numtiles)
00081 {
00082  Uint8 *u_offset;
00083  for(size_t t=0;t<numtiles;t++)
00084  {
00085   for(size_t y=0;y<tilesize;y++)
00086   {
00087    for(size_t x=0;x<tilesize;x++)
00088    {
00089     u_offset = pixels +
00090          tilesize*tilesize*columns*(t/columns) +
00091          tilesize*(t%columns) +
00092          tilesize*columns*y + x;
00093     *u_offset |= (getbit(p) << p);
00094    }
00095   }
00096  }
00097 }
